transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Haan hello. Haan ji sir. Haan ji sir.
Executive: Haan main Naved baat kar raha hun Aleena International se.

Customer: Woh mera abhi tak refund nahi aaya.

Customer: Aleena International.
Executive: Haan mera abhi tak refund nahi aaya abhi tak.
Customer: Aleena International. Aleena International. Ye lijiye aap inse please sir baat kar lijiye mere sir.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji hello. Haan ji sir. Haan ji sir namaskar.
Executive: Namaskar ji main main Naved ji main Aleena International se bol raha hun main kitni baar phone karu aap logo ko abhi tak mera refund nahi kiya aap logo ne.
Executive: Sir aapse itne acche se baat hui thi sir maine aapko bataya to tha sir. Main aap ye bataiye ki kya aap refund nahi karenge kya aap log?
Executive: Sir main ek cheez batau aapko imandari se aapka shubh naam kya hai sir?
Customer: Mera naam Mohammad Ali Naved hai.
Executive: Nafees ji se baat hui thi kya?
Customer: Naved Naved.
Executive: Naved. Haan Naved ji dekhiye aapka IndiaMART mein dekhiye hume koi aapko jabardasti nahi rakhna hai sir.
Executive: Dekhiye hamara bhi hum ek hafte se ek hafte se main phone kar raha hun ki mera band kar dijiye mera jo bacha hua paisa hai woh wapas kijiye kyun nahi kar rahe aap?
Executive: Sir main wohi keh raha hun dekhiye hamara aap bhi jab IndiaMART pe sir aaye the to aapne ye soch ke nahi aaye the aap IndiaMART pe ki mujhe business apna close karna hai ya refund lena hai aap ye soch ke to nahi aaye the sir?
Customer: Are ye soch ke nahi aaye the lekin jab bilkul fraud hai sab kuch aap yahan fraud chal raha hai aadmi ko chutiya bana rahe hain aap log to aadmi paisa to wapas lega.
Executive: Nahi sir sir ye language mat use kijiye aap dekhiye main pura support karne ke liye. Yahi language sahi hai aap logo ke liye. Yahi language sahi hai.
Customer: Yahi language sahi hai aap logo ke liye ki aap log sirf bewakoof bana rahe hain wahan se baith kar ke phone kar kar ke insan ko aur insan aapko chutiya mein fas ja raha hai.
Executive: Sir aapko main ek hafte se main phone kar raha hun ek ki bhai mera jo bhi hai jo bhi bacha hua hai woh aap wapas kar do aap yahan se hota hai ki theek hai sir aaj ho jayega kal ho jayega phir kuch baat hi nahi ho raha hai.
Customer: Naved ji maine aapko na apne number se call kiya hua hai zara ek baar uthaiye aap.
Customer: Main to hum kyun uthaye aapke number pe call main main aapko personally thodi janta hun main to IndiaMART ko janta hun.
Executive: Haan haan to main bhi IndiaMART se hi baat kar raha hun sir main ye keh raha hun aapko aapke waiting mein call aa raha hai aap mera mera matter khatam kijiye na bhai mera paisa wapas kijiye. Baat khatam.
Customer: Sir waiting mein aapki call itna lamba aapko khichne ki zarurat kya pad rahi hai?
Customer: Haan? Sir ek baat bataiye aapko mujhe baar baar karna pad raha hai mujhe itna fraud lag raha hai ki koi samajh hi mein nahi aa raha hai. Sir waiting mein aapke call ja raha hai ek baar uthaiye aap.
Executive: Main aap main jab ispe baat kar raha hun to aap isi pe baat karo na aapko call uthane se kya matlab hota hai mujhe. Chaliye theek hai isi pe baat kar lete hain. Ab mujhe ye bataiye sir ek second aapko ek second sir.
Customer: Nahi aap ye bataiye ek baar ki baat ki aap paisa aap log doge kyun nahi doge?
Customer: Wapas karoge mera band karoge mera. Sir maine wohi bola aap. Sir main wohi keh raha hun aapko ki hume koi jabardasti nahi rakhna hai aapko sir. Jabardasti aap bhi sir ye soch ke nahi aaye the. Aapse kitna request kiya maine ki sir aap bahut acche se baat kar rahe ho aap mera kaam karo mera band kar do mera paisa wapas kar do aur kya karu main aapse ye to bataiye. Kaise baat karu main aapko. Sir main ye keh raha hun aapko. Haan sir maine dekhiye aapse ye bhi bola tha sir ki aapke paas koi bhi written communication aapke paas hai kya kyunki hum na kabhi is cheez ko nahi is tarike se support karte hain. Dekho aisa hai aisa thodi hai ki yaar aap jo hai online pe baithe hue to aap soch rahe hain ki hum bilkul surakshit hai fraud karo aur surakshit raho aisa thodi hota hai.
Customer: Aap mera paisa wapas kar do koi baat nahi karunga mera band karo paisa. Sir maine sir maine aapko ye bola ki sir aapko mujhe aur koi baat nahi karni hai aap mera paisa wapas kar do baat khatam. Sir paise
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received refund yet.

- Wants to close account and get refund.



Resolution:

- Executive stated they don't force anyone to stay.

- Executive asked for written communication.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, account closure, fraud, indiaMART
